home.personal_or_community_projects: A gallery for personal or community projects

about.description: is a modern platform where developers can easily pull and showcase their projects from Github and share them with the community.
about.description2: Add your own project, discover others' projects, get inspired, and be part of the software community.
about.githubConnect: Just connect your Github account with one click, and your projects will automatically appear in the gallery!

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: You must sign in to view your profile information.
